lead_paragraph: Oklahoma's wild ride to the Final Four last spring was fueled by Buddy Hield's shooting, Isaiah Cousins' court vision and Ryan Spangler's power in the post.

headline.print_headline: Old Faces Depart, Fresh New Look Awaits Big 12 Hoops Season
headline.main: Old Faces Depart, Fresh New Look Awaits Big 12 Hoops Season
